name: Secunda (Beta)
description:
A visual novel in the genre of dark fantasy in which you play as a sorcerer, born in the empire of warlocks, living on the gloomy, alienated islands of the north - where winters last for years and nights for months. 

You are powerful and skilled in the dark arts, but even for someone like you, the fog lands can be merciless. To take care of your coven and lead it to prosperity, you do heavy deeds, bond with creatures that have been on these lands long before your kin, and forge alliances with other sorcerers.

At the moment, four love interests are planned - each of them will be associated with a completely different course of history and path to power. You will meet Veila the guardian of the north, the fugitive sorcerer, the huldra alchemist and your very own affectionate demon.

Note from author / developer:
